rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a foyer leading to living areas and corridors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area featuring Mediterranean-style decor with warm tones and natural textures.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Sleek dining space adjacent to the kitchen, providing a communal area for family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped Mediterranean-style kitchen with modern amenities integrated into traditional designs. Features include open shelving and stone countertops.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom, private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with ample storage and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: Second guest room designed for flexibility, featuring built-in wardrobes and a small sitting area.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Common bathroom shared between the guest rooms; Vastu compliant with water features positioned in the northeast.

openings.description: Double glazed door ensuring security and energy efficiency.
Open passage leading to the central courtyard, promoting natural light and ventilation.
Large window ensuring a bright living space in alignment with Vastu principles for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: The elevated master bedroom features a larger en-suite bathroom with a private terrace overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members, designed with ample natural light and storage space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom accommodating guests or extended family needs; Vastu aligned placement ensuring calm energy.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: Dedicated study area serving as a library with built-in bookcases, comfortable seating and ample lighting for reading.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for the upper floor bedrooms; designed to be serene in line with Vastu recommendations for water placement.

openings.description: Private balcony with Mediterranean-style railings offering panoramic views of the courtyard and landscape.
Strategically placed window enhancing natural light and ensuring Vastu alignment for knowledge and growth.

rooms.name: Roof Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace area with seating arrangements, greenery and potential for additional relaxation space. Vastu alignment ensures energy balance.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the first floor to the roof terrace, ensuring safe and easy access.

vastu_details.water_features: Installed near the Northeastern corner in bathrooms to promote positive energy.
vastu_details.storage_rooms: Placed in the West of the house for abundance and wealth.

mediterranean_elements.roof_design: Steep, terracotta-tiled roof that enhances Mediterranean aesthetics.
mediterranean_elements.courtyard_style: Central courtyard designed for natural light and ventilation in line with both Vastu and Mediterranean design principles.
